protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: The H4 subclass of histamine receptors could mediate the histamine signals in peripheral tissues. Displays a significant level of constitutive activity (spontaneous activity in the absence of agonist)

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
